text.value: Severe lower abdominal pain / continuous vomiting
In women who have given birth by surgery, is bleeding at the site of surgery, very painful?
Redness of Calf or swollen or difficulty in breathing or chest pain
Please make sure about danger signs, rechek again
Difficulty in micturition or leak urine
Severe continuous headache or blurred vision
Do you have mood and emotional swings?
Give advice and pressure to the deliver woman and family members to go to the health institution for check-up.
**Please refer to the health facility immediately. Accompany her if possible.**
Currently there are no any danger signs. Counsel to mother about danger signs.
You have reported following danger signs during PNC visit before
Thank you very much for visiting the health facility
Foul smelling white discharge from vagina
Did visit the health facility as recommended?
तल्लो पेट कडादुख्नु / तारन्तार बान्ता भैरहेको छ ?
शल्यक्रिया गरेर प्रसुति गराएका महिला मा शल्यक्रिया गरेको ठाउँमा रगत बगिरहेको, निकै कडा दुखिरहेको छ ?
पिंडुला रातो भएको वा सुन्निएको, श्वास फेर्न गाह्रो हुनु वा छाती दुखी रहेको छ ?
कृपया, खतराका चिन्हहरु छ कि छैन भनि पुन : जांच गर्नुहोस् ।
पिसाब सजिलै फेर्न नसक्ने वा पिसाब चुहिन छ ?
कडा / लगातार टाउको दुख्नु वा दृष्टि धमिलो छ ?
स्वास्थ्य संस्था गएर जाँच गर्नको लागि सुत्केरी महिला र घरका सदस्य लाई परामर्स र दबाब दिनुहोस् ।यसले गर्दा के कस्ता किसिमको खतरा हुनसक्छ जानकारी गराउनुहोस् ।
**सुत्केरी महिलामा खतराका चिन्हहरु देखिएको ले तुरुन्तै नजिकको स्वास्थ्य संस्थामा लैजान सल्लाह दिनुहोस् । यदि सम्भव भए तपाई पनि संगै जानुहोस् ।**
हाल नव सुत्केरी महिलामा कुनै खतराका चिन्हहरु छैन ।सुत्केरी महिलामा के कस्ता किसिमका खतरा हुनसक्छन जानकारी गराउनुहोस् ।
तपाईले सुत्केरी अवस्था मा निम्न खतराका चिन्हहरु छन् भनि रिपोर्ट गर्नु भएको थियो
स्वास्थ्य संस्था गएर जाँच गर्नु भएकोमा धेरै धन्यबाद
योनी बाट धेरै रगत बगीरहेको छ ?
योनी बाट सेतो गन्ध आउने पानी बगीरहेको छ ?
के ले स्वास्थ्य संस्था गएर जाँच गर्नु भएको छ ?
खतराका चिन्ह पहिचान पछि पुन : भेट्

bind.calculate: if(selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/fever , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/vaginal_bleeding , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/body_spasms , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/headache , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/abd_pain , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/vaginal_discharge , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/calf_redness_or_difficulty_breathing , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/difficulty_or_leak_urine , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/moody , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/bleeding_at_surgical_site , 'yes'), 'yes', 'no')

if(selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/fever , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/vaginal_bleeding , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/body_spasms , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/headache , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/abd_pain , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/vaginal_discharge , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/calf_redness_or_difficulty_breathing , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/difficulty_or_leak_urine , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/moody , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_mother/danger_signs/bleeding_at_surgical_site , 'yes'), 'yes', 'no')
